/* global chrome */import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){var count=0;const[isPink,setIsPink]=useState(false);const[currentOption,setCurrentOption]=useState(0);const options=['product 1','product 2','product 3'];const[imageSrc,setImageSrc]=useState("/smile1.png");const handleClick=()=>{setIsPink(!isPink);};const updateImage=index=>{setImageSrc("/smile"+(index+1)+".png");};// left and right moving
const handleLeft=()=>{const newIndex=(currentOption-1+options.length)%options.length;setCurrentOption(newIndex);updateImage(newIndex);};const handleRight=()=>{const newIndex=(currentOption+1)%options.length;setCurrentOption(newIndex);updateImage(newIndex);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"App-logo",alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{class:"product_image",id:"product",src:imageSrc,alt:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"App-link",href:"https://reactjs.org",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"Learn React"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,className:"App-button",id:"findElementButton",style:{backgroundColor:isPink?'#bd4880':'initial'},children:"Click Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:options[currentOption]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLeft,className:"left-triangle"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleRight,className:"right-triangle"})]})]})});}export default App;
